children.summary: Manual summarization of long discussions and searching for key points is inefficient and frustrating.
A tool that makes AI and video files searchable, interactive, and insightful using Whisper AI technology.
Automatic speech-to-text with high accuracy, sentiment analysis, name detection, key topic detection, and interactive features such as searching, clickable timestamps, and quick summaries.
Using XJS, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, OpenIS Whisper local model, PostgreSQL, NeonDB, FFmpeg, VideoGS, and WaveCipherGS for seamless playback.

Designed for anyone dealing with audio or video content; can be used in corporations, education, law, and content creation to extract key decisions, summarize lectures, generate automatic transcripts, repurpose moments, and analyze customer interactions.
